code:
gantt
    title Mulisa Performance Timeline
    dateFormat X
    axisFormat %L ms
    
    section Voice (Education_ContentCDN)
    WebRTC P2P Communication    :crit, voice, 0, 50
    
    section AI Pipeline (Education_ClassroomService)
    Audio Capture               :ai1, 0, 10
    Speech-to-Text              :ai2, after ai1, 200
    LLM Analysis                :ai3, after ai2, 500  
    Action Generation           :ai4, after ai3, 100
    Dashboard Update            :ai5, after ai4, 50
    
    section Targets
    Voice Target (Education_ClassroomService)        :milestone, target1, 50, 0
    AI Target (Education_ContentCDN)         :milestone, target2, 860, 0
